{txt:msx-white: ForkPlayer} is an application software for viewing fxml(Fork eXtensible Markup Language) pages on the global network. ForkPlayer is used for requesting, processing, manipulating and displaying the content of fxml sites, as well as for directly viewing the content of playlist files (m3u,xml,xspf), images (gif, jpeg, png), audio-video formats (mp3, mpeg, mkv), streaming video (udp, hls).
{txt:msx-white: OTT-Play} is a multiplatform IPTV player available on televisions, set-top boxes and mobile devices.
{txt:msx-white: OTTplayer} is a service that allows you to put all your IP TV into one playlist, adjust the order of channels, get an electronic TV guide.
